chapters.title: Introduction to ETFs
chapters.summary: An overview of Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), their benefits, and how they work.

chapters.title: Strategies for Investing in ETFs
chapters.summary: Effective strategies for investing in ETFs, including long-term and short-term approaches.

chapters.title: Diversification with ETFs
chapters.summary: How ETFs can be used to diversify an investment portfolio and reduce risk.

chapters.title: Building a Portfolio with ETFs
chapters.summary: Guidelines for constructing a well-balanced portfolio using ETFs, including asset allocation and rebalancing.
